title: Miss Grey's Shady Lover
description: A parody of the erotic Fifty Shades of Grey. This tongue-in-cheek story is set in the eighteenth century, where aspiring servant, Anya Grey, goes to work at Pretentious Hall and meets the strikingly handsome and dangerous, not to mention damaged, Lord Libidinous. He soon involves her in a sultry affair where she must submit to his lecherous and tormented needs. Prepare to laugh, and sigh, at their sexy, and explicitly steamy, antics.Erotica and humor.
author: Diane Scott Lewis
